preqs: ATS2127 or ATS2808This unit is only available to students enrolled in a Bachelor of Music single or double degree - Music composition specialisation.

rules.ruleString: (Must be enrolled in course version {0821, 1185, 1497, 2025, 3054, 3717, 3774, A2003, A2004, B2022, D3004, D30041, D30042, L3006, S2005} and Any co-req unit set {COMPOSE01, MUSIC-COMP})
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS2127, ATS2808}

description: This unit consolidates and extends the intermediate skills in composition developed in ATS2127 Composition 3. Students further develop technical skills by writing more complex multi-movement works and responding with a well-developed plan to a complex set concept. Students also extend their knowledge of acoustic instruments by writing for large instrumental groups. This prepares students for the advanced level study of compositional techniques in the next unit in the sequence, ATS3140 Composition 5.
